tasks.task: Starting tomato, pepper, and eggplant seeds in a greenhouse using heat mats
subtasks: Confirming current temperature outside and desired seed germination temperature
Preparing pots or furrows with potting soil
Positioning pots or furrows over heat mats
Marking seed packets for variety identification and noting the planting date
Tapping seeds into furrows with a small crease in the packet for alignment
Covering seeds with loose soil to a depth of about a quarter inch
Labeling each planted furrow with a popsicle stick
Planting seedlings in individual pots for future separation and growth
Transferring sprouted seeds to larger containers to promote healthy growth before planting outdoors
Using coin envelopes for seed storage
Labeling seeds with variety names and planting dates for organized seed management
Separating closely planted seedlings to ensure proper spacing and ventilation
Sharing website links for seed access
Recommending a free ebook on gardening
Encouraging viewers to support the farm and gardening efforts.

tasks.task: Growing a hundred square foot garden
subtasks: Providing information on space-efficient gardening techniques
Offering resources for gardeners to grow a productive garden in a limited area
